actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend subchapter III of chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, relating to civil service retirement.

summary.text: Increases the multiplication factor to 2 1/2 percent of a Federal employee's average pay times the years of total service, for purposes of computing Civil Service retirement annuities. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8339(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend subchapter III of chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, relating to civil service retirement.
